title: Interpretation of a dream about going out with your lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about going out with a lover in a dream. You want to know the interpretations of your dreams. Below we present to you the interpretation of a dream about going out with a lover in a dream and other details..Interpretation of a dream about going out with a lover in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about going out with a lover in a dream can lead to intense love from her for the lover, and God knows best. The unseen. When you see your lover dating in a dream, it could be a sign of communication with the girl, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees that she is dating her lover, this may indicate her intense love, and God knows all that no one has seen. Also, seeing a dream of going out with your lover in an unknown place It may indicate that the dreamer must take care of the lover, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of sitting with a lover in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of sitting with a lover in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing someone sitting next to someone can lead to love and passion, and God He knows everything that is unseen. If a single girl sees herself sitting next to someone in a dream, this may be evidence of a relationship, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing someone sitting next to someone she loves may indicate his benefit, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a lover defending his girlfriend in a dream. Interpretation A dream of a lover defending his beloved in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing defending someone you love can lead to good news, and God knows best. Also, seeing defending someone you love in a dream can indicate getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If a woman sees For a married woman in a dream, someone will defend her, as this may be a sign of good news, God willing. Interpretation of dreams of my beloved kissing another girl in a dream. However, seeing betrayal may express the dreamer’s ability to succeed, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When she sees Betrayal in a dream can be a sign of intense love, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees betrayal in a dream, it expresses the negative thoughts that the girl is thinking, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my boyfriend talking to another girl in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my boyfriend talking to another girl in a dream. Cheating can express the lover’s attachment to her and his love for her, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees her lover talking to a girl she knows, this may lead to tension in the relationship with the girl, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a single girl sees her lover talking to another girl in a dream This may indicate that the dreamer doubts the lover and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Also, seeing a lover talking to another girl can express jealousy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a lover betraying an unknown girl in a dream. title: Learn about the interpretation of the moon in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the moon in a dream: The moon is part of the solar system and appears in the sky at night and it is desirable to look at it because it gives comfort and reassurance and we make him resort to it. Therefore, in this article we will mention the largest number of cases and interpretations dating back to the great scholars and interpreters of the world of dreams such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the moon in a dreamThe moon A dream includes many connotations and a sign that can be recognized through the following cases: The moon in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate the abundance of sustenance and legal money that the dreamer will acquire. If the dreamer sees the moon in a dream, this is a sign of his elevation, rank, and status among men, and the transfer of his fame. Seeing the moon is In a dream, it means that the dreamer will assume an important position in which he will achieve great achievements and success, which will make him the focus of everyone’s attention. Interpretation of the moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin It will show the dreamer's good condition, his religion, and his closeness to God. If the dreamer sees the moon shining in the sky in a dream, it symbolizes the fulfillment of his dreams, desires, and goals that he sought so much. Seeing the moon in a dream means that the dreamer will be healed from any disease or evil that impairs the enjoyment of health and well-being. , which will last a lifetime. Interpretation of the moon in a dream by Al-OsaimiThrough the following interpretations, we will present the most important opinions and sayings of Al-Osaimi in interpreting the moon in a dream, as follows: The moon in a dream by Al-Osaimi indicates the calm, tranquility, and tranquility that the dreamer will enjoy in his life. If the dreamer sees The moon in a dream, this symbolizes that he overcame the difficulties and obstacles that blocked his way to reach his goals. Seeing the moon in a dream indicates a lot of good money and abundance that the dreamer will obtain in the upcoming work period or legitimate inheritance. Interpretation of the moon in a dream according to Nabulus, one of the most prominent interpreters Who dealt with the interpretation of the moon in Al-Nabulsi’s dream, and the following are some of the interpretations contained in it: Al-Nabulsi interprets the moon in a dream as an indication of the high status that the dreamer will achieve in his life. Seeing the moon in a dream indicates useful knowledge that the dreamer possesses that will benefit others and his name will be immortalized. Interpretation The moon in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s marital status, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl who dreams that the moon is rich in the sky is a sign of joy and happy events that will come to her and will rejoice her heart. Seeing the moon indicates in A dream for an unmarried woman indicates her relationship and marriage with an important figure in society who enjoys a prominent position with whom she will live a happy and luxurious life. If a girl sees the full moon in a dream, this symbolizes the death of her worries and sorrows and the enjoyment of a happy and stable life. Interpretation of the moon in a dream for a married woman. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing the moon in A dream? We will find out the answer through the following cases

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about falling in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about falling in a dream The most thing a person thinks about is dreams and visions, and what is meant by them, are they good or bad? Our topic today is the dream of falling, that is, falling to the ground because the body loses its balance. Many of us see in our dreams that he fell from a building or a high place. We are searching to interpret his vision and clarify the interpretations and connotations about it. Interpretation of the dream of falling in a dream: The dream may indicate salvation from a problem, if one feels If a person experiences fear and panic of falling, this indicates a rise in status and an increase in wealth, but if he is injured by a fall, it indicates hardship and the loss of some loved ones or friends. And if he sees that he is falling from a place, that is, falling from top to bottom, this may lead to a change in condition. Social or change in the field of work, but if it occurs on an animal or a place without humans. This indicates a bad outcome. Interpretation of seeing falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned more than one indication of seeing falling in a dream, such as: A person who falls from the mountains or from the top of a fence or palm trees and trees indicates a paradox or the end of a relationship, and his falling from one place to another. Another may indicate the beginning of a new stage that he is looking for. If a person falls and is injured, this indicates that he will fall into a big problem and face some obstacles. Children in a dream are food and great goodness, but the appearance of a child symbolizes the emergence of problems or financial crises in the coming period for the fortuneteller, but A child falling from a high place and the fortuneteller catching him indicates an end to the crises and problems that the dreamer is suffering from. A person falling from the roof of a house and breaking his arm or leg indicates a calamity for himself or his money. However, if this happened in a mosque or kindergarten, it indicates a disaster for himself or his money. Permanence of sins. The presence of water in the place of a fall indicates the presence of great dangers. If the ground is wet, this indicates a tendency toward emotion without fear of the consequences. If the place contains stones, this indicates the severity of the obstacles and dangers that will follow. The initial presence of water at the landing site is an indication of blessings and pleasure from the Nile. If he falls into a hole, it may indicate that this person will suffer from some problems and obstacles in the coming period. Falling into a dark well can lead the viewer to be exposed to extreme poverty, and if he emerges from this well This means that he will survive the dangers that he will face and overcome. If a person climbs a ladder and then falls, this indicates the failure of something specific to him at work or in his family environment. However, if he sees himself falling from the ladder but survives without being harmed, this is a sign of... Overcoming difficulties and upcoming problems. Falling in a dream can symbolize good luck, comfort, and getting a new job or trip. Falling from the animal’s back to the ground indicates that the fortuneteller is dishonest, and does not keep his vows, and if he falls from the beast, it means delaying the trip or Disturbing what he seeks. Falling into a single woman’s dream, and thanks to God, this matter is very praiseworthy, as it is evidence of a happy occasion that will occur in the near future, and it may be a sign of marrying someone

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing waves in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing yourself laughing in a dream on the Moments website. All happy occasions unfold, when children succeed we see a state of great happiness that involves singing, and at weddings and speeches happiness is expressed with the throat, but praise in dreams and dreams has the same interpretation, or is it another interpretation? This is what we will explain today in our article. Interpretation of seeing yourself screaming in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation that seeing a neck in a dream symbolizes joys and happy occasions in general, and the clarification of asceticism as an indication of happiness depends on society and the traditions of the beholder. Activation in a dream is influenced by traditions and the society of the viewer, because it stems from the subconscious. Whoever sees in his dream howling his parents, son, or one of his dear relatives in his heart are immigrants, then seeing asceticism in a dream means that the passenger will return very soon, and also screaming in the dream indicates something he invented. Whoever saw it, and as for the one who saw joy in his dream, and it has grooves, then his vision indicates that there will be a trial on the one with insight. Read also: Interpretation of seeing death in a dreamInterpretation of seeing them hunting in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she was being hunted and engaged, then Watching her indicates the approaching date of her marriage, but if she is not engaged, then this vision indicates her closeness. Interpretation of seeing screaming in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself laughing in her dream, this means that she is a bad woman, and praise in a married woman’s dream indicates that there are people They speak ill of her and dig up her reputation. Interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing herself screaming in a dream: If he sees a pregnant woman in her dream and there are many of them, then watching her indicates that she will give birth more clearly.

title: Those born in March are among the adults

preview.html: Affection and charisma are traits that are often associated with people born in the month of March. They are very compassionate and like to serve others if they respect them. Honesty is among the various virtues that people born in this month possess. While most of these are born in Pisces, others are born on Pisces/Aries edge. Learn information about those born in the mighty month of March. I wish you a Merry Christmas March Adults of the first quarter of March March 1, 1910: Scottish actor David Niven from The Pink Panther. March 2, 1545: Thomas Bodley, scholar, diplomat and founder of the famous Bodleian Library in Oxford. March 3, 1847: Alexander Graham Bell, Scottish inventor of the telephone, the picture telephone, the gramophone, the microphone, and a host of other inventions truly useful to mankind. March 4, 1928: Allan Sillitoe, author and playwright, whose books include “Saturday Night” and “Sunday Morning” and “The Long Distance Runner.” March 5, 1133: King Henry II, son of Matilda and Godfrey of Anjou, who was to become the first Plantagenet king of England. March 6, 1806: Elizabeth Barrett Browning, a Victorian poet whose works include Portuguese sonnets, may have been overshadowed Her most famous husband, Robert Browning. March 7, 1802: Edwin Henry Landseer, painter and sculptor of the Lions in Trafalgar Square, London. March 8, 1859: Kenneth Grahame, author of the Scottish children's book The Wind in the Willow. March 9, 1763: William Cobbett, author and politician and a journalist who championed the cause of the dispossessed and wrote “Riding the Country” in 1830. March 10, 1964: Prince Edward, youngest son of Queen Elizabeth II. Adults in the first quarter of MarchAdults in the second quarter of March March 11, 1885: Sir Malcolm Campbell, holder of the world land and sea speed record March 12, 1710: Thomas Arne, English composer who wrote “The Judgment of Britannia.” March 13, 1733: Dr. Joseph Priestley, scientist who discovered oxygen in 1774. March 14, 1836: Lady Isabella Beaton, author of Mrs. Beeton’s Book of Household Management – ​​Everything a Woman Needs From the Victorian middle class to his knowledge! March 15, 1779: William Lamb, Viscount Melbourne, twice British Prime Minister in the early 19th century. March 16, 1774: English explorer Matthew Flinders discovered the Flinders Mountain Range and the Flinders River in Australia. March 17, 1939: Robin Knox Johnston, the first person to travel alone non-stop around the world. March 18, 1869: Neville Chamberlain, British Prime Minister who tried unsuccessfully to make peace with Hitler. March 19, 1813: Dr. David Livingstone, Scottish missionary and explorer, is the first white man to see Victoria Falls. His missionary work was less successful. March 20, 1917: Singer and actress Vera Lynn was born in London. By the age of seven, she was regularly performing in men's work clubs, and gave her first show in 193

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a period that comes down and the interpretation of a dream about a period that comes down heavily.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation: Menstruation is one of the things that makes a woman feel afraid if she sees it in a dream, especially since the appearance of blood causes her anxiety and makes her nervous from the dream. If you are interested in learning about the interpretation of this dream, you should follow us in the following lines of our article. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation Entering your menstrual cycle in a dream is one of the things that scientists confirm is a symbol of salvation from worries and misery, especially if the girl or woman feels better in her dream and gets rid of the pain that She felt it, so the meaning is an indication of obtaining a decent life, God willing. One of the signs of the appearance of menstrual blood for a girl is that it is a good sign that she will achieve her many dreams, especially those that were afraid of them or bothered her, which means that she faced difficulties with them in the past, but they will be soon. Among them currently.Interpretation of the dream of menstruation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin emphasizes the dream of menstruation, which represents a great blessing and livelihood, especially for a married woman, because it confirms the abundance of her luck in married life and the extent of her husband’s cooperation with her, and this always makes her feel content and satisfied. Good, with the blood appearing red, and this is what another group opposes, as they show that it is a symbol of distress and anguish for married people. Menstrual blood carries good tidings for the unmarried girl, because it confirms her health, that he is fine, and gives her good news that what she aspires to will happen, while he does not see good. In black menstruation it appears to represent a disorder. And increasing what is psychologically harmful. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream of a period coming for a single woman. One of the interpretations of seeing a circle in a dream for an unmarried woman is that it is a good omen, especially in Matters related to her emotional life, as she can achieve great happiness with the young man she is associated with, especially as the period approaches. Her marriage to him. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the dream that the menstrual cycle falls on the unmarried woman, as it is a good sign for the girl who suffers from distress or many worries around her, as it indicates her good way of thinking, in which she judges matters. . With her mind and do not let her emotions control them. If an unmarried woman is wary of her role and this leads to soiling her clothes and she is surprised by this ugly scene, then this can be considered evidence of the wrong behaviors that she performed in the past that would harm her in the present and harm her if she had previously done so. That it caused harm to others. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s period: The menstrual cycle came in a married woman’s dream in many interpretations. Some experts see it as good and that it is an increase in nutrition for her and an abundance of love and kindness between her and her husband, while some indicate that it is not good. Rather, it expresses loss and a feeling of despair. Some experts say that cleansing a married woman of menstrual blood is better than seeing it in a dream, where she is sincere and prays to God Almighty constantly, in addition to shifting the sadness that she had due to sin.
preview.text: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation: Menstruation is one of the things that makes a woman feel afraid if she sees it in a dream, especially since the appearance of blood causes her anxiety and makes her nervous from the dream. If you are interested in learning about the interpretation of this dream, you should follow us in the following lines of our article. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation Entering your menstrual cycle in a dream is one of the things that scientists confirm is a symbol of salvation from worries and misery, especially if the girl or woman feels better in her dream and gets rid of the pain that She felt it, so the meaning is an indication of obtaining a decent life, God willing. One of the signs of the appearance of menstrual blood for a girl is that it is a good sign that she will achieve her many dreams, especially those that were afraid of them or bothered her, which means that she faced difficulties with them in the past, but they will be soon. Among them currently.Interpretation of the dream of menstruation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin emphasizes the dream of menstruation, which represents a great blessing and livelihood, especially for a married woman, because it confirms the abundance of her luck in married life and the extent of her husband’s cooperation with her, and this always makes her feel content and satisfied. Good, with the blood appearing red, and this is what another group opposes, as they show that it is a symbol of distress and anguish for married people. Menstrual blood carries good tidings for the unmarried girl, because it confirms her health, that he is fine, and gives her good news that what she aspires to will happen, while he does not see good. In black menstruation it appears to represent a disorder. And increasing what is psychologically harmful. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream of a period coming for a single woman. One of the interpretations of seeing a circle in a dream for an unmarried woman is that it is a good omen, especially in Matters related to her emotional life, as she can achieve great happiness with the young man she is associated with, especially as the period approaches. Her marriage to him. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the dream that the menstrual cycle falls on the unmarried woman, as it is a good sign for the girl who suffers from distress or many worries around her, as it indicates her good way of thinking, in which she judges matters. . With her mind and do not let her emotions control them. If an unmarried woman is wary of her role and this leads to soiling her clothes and she is surprised by this ugly scene, then this can be considered evidence of the wrong behaviors that she performed in the past that would harm her in the present and harm her if she had previously done so. That it caused harm to others. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s period: The menstrual cycle came in a married woman’s dream in many interpretations. Some experts see it as good and that it is an increase in nutrition for her and an abundance of love and kindness between her and her husband, while some indicate that it is not good. Rather, it expresses loss and a feeling of despair. Some experts say that cleansing a married woman of menstrual blood is better than seeing it in a dream, where she is sincere and prays to God Almighty constantly, in addition to shifting the sadness that she had due to sin.

title: Learn more about the interpretation and interpretation of the appearance of a bow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretations and evidence of the vision of lying down during sleep: Kneeling in a dream is one of the most beautiful and beloved visions in the souls of many Muslims, and this vision can bring great confidence to whoever dreams of it, but these interpretations differ from one person to another, and these interpretations differ in their positions. The vision if the prostration is in prayer or the blessing of God. Interpretation of a dream of lying down If a person sees kneeling in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer had a business relationship with one of the people, but after a period of time in these actions, the other person’s position turned against him and he began to Abuse, and so, this vision now shows that the dreamer has the ability to respond to this abuse and give him the perfect answer for what he did to him. If this previous vision saw someone prostrating in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will receive a great deal of abundant sustenance in The near future, and that the various projects he is working on will contain a lot of food. As for men who dream of this previous vision, it may be a good sign for him and that he will have a lot of goodness, happiness and satisfaction in the near future. Prostrating in a dream to Al-UsaimiIf a married man dreams that he Worshiped, this vision indicates that God will soon give him a new baby whose gender will be male. If one sees this previous vision, but he is not married, this is evidence that God will give him a perfect and good wife soon and that his marriage will happen soon. As for the one who dreams of this vision that He worships her, and this dreamer suffers from a sick problem in reality, so this vision is an indication that the dreamer will be blessed by God with a speedy recovery from his illness. What does bowing of gratitude mean in a dream? If a married woman sees in a dream that she is worshiping God to please Him, then this vision indicates that she will live In the coming period, a happy and stable married life without obstacles or problems. This previous vision, if a married woman sees it, could be evidence that she is trying to achieve some goals and that she will be able to achieve them in the coming period and actually achieve them on the ground. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group One of the leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Interpretation of a dream about prostrating in prayer. If one sees in a dream that he is in prayer, and he prayed and prostrated in it, then this vision indicates that person’s longing and desire to go to the Kaaba, and that God will grant him this desire as soon as possible And it is. Also evidence of stoning is there. The same vision in a married woman’s dream can have a different meaning than the previous one, which is that God will soon give her a new child, which will make her happy and bring joy to the whole family. Interpretation of a dream about worshiping God Thank youIf one sees in a dream that he is worshiping God For him, this vision indicates that the dreamer is suffering from a misfortune and that God will soon take it away from him. If one sees the same vision in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer’s livelihood will expand greatly and he will always be in a state of renewal and a better condition than it is.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a ruler according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a ruler according to Ibn Sirin: The average person sleeps for about 8 hours every day. Some of those hours pass by as if they were minutes and sometimes they pass by as if they were days. His sleep continues for the rest of the day and for other days, and these dreams affect a person’s ambition and life, and is it possible for a person’s life to be reversed just because he saw a dream in his dream, so he began to do so. Run to achieve this dream, and does reality have an impact on our dreams or is it our dreams that affect our reality? This is what we will answer in this article. How do dreams change reality? Some of us wake up with a dream that we saw during our deep sleep, and some of us remember that dream that we saw and some of us do not remember anything of what we saw, and some of us can relate to the dreams that we saw and experience. They practiced their lives to achieve this dream, to see that in the end there is a big difference between reality and dreams, but there are people whose dreams changed their lives for the better. This is the Prophet of God, Joseph, peace be upon him. The dream of the precious Egyptian changed the life of our Master Joseph, peace be upon him, for the better and he was released from prison because the beloved saw in a dream that there were seven fat cows. Which ate seven tender ears, seven green ears, and another dry one, and this precious one wanted to interpret this dream, but no one could interpret it except the Prophet of God, Joseph, peace be upon him. Interpretation of the dream of the ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream and stated in his book that he wrote that if If a person sees in his dream that he is talking to the ruler, this is great evidence of the speaker’s confidence in himself and his great ability to speak. And public speaking.. good things will happen in his life, and if he sees that he is getting a wallet it shows a lot of food and abundance. Reasons why people interpret dreams The reason why people interpret dreams and resort to interpreters, especially those who have interpretation books such as Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi, is that the person He needs confirmation about his life and knowing what awaits him in his near future. A dream in which he saw the killing of all the people of Egypt. Read also: Here our interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing the ruler in a dream ends, and we summarized what Ibn Sirin mentioned in his books and what followed in his notes. I hope you like this article.

title: Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream and peeling them in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of eating red apples: Whoever sees that he is eating a lot of red apples in a dream, this means, and God knows, that a person tells many lies in hadith. But if a girl, whether she is single, married, or pregnant, sees herself eating apples, this means that she wants a man other than her husband or the presence of adultery. Interpretation of drinking: A dream about apple juice: Whoever dreams that he is drinking apple juice means that he is arrogant and arrogant in this world. As for someone who sees apple peels in his dream, the dream indicates the presence of a malicious, evil, and disobedient woman in his life. Whoever dreams of throwing apples from a ruler, president, or someone who holds an important position means that all dreams The sleeper and his desires will be fulfilled. Interpretation of the vision of cutting apples: Whoever dreams that he is cutting apples, means that the sleeper gives his money to those in need. And whoever sees in his dream that he is injured while cutting apples, this means, according to the dreamers, that he will feel sadness, delusion, and extreme distress. As for whoever sees that he is cutting apples and peeling them for himself, it means That he will discover something or a secret in someone. Seeing an apple tree in a dream If a pregnant woman dreams of an apple tree, this means that she will give birth to good offspring and that her due date is very close. And whoever sees that he is planting or planting an apple tree in the ground, this means that he will be given an orphan. As for the one who dreams of picking apples from the tree, this is evidence that the sleeper will obtain very abundant money as a result of his knowledge, which is a great service to man. As for the one who is seen picking apples from the tree, according to Ibn Shirin, this means that the sleeper will be expelled from his place because of the apple incident with our master Adam and Eve. As for someone who dreams of licking an apple, it only shows that the sleeper will get food and profit soon. Interpretation of seeing an apple in a dream: Whoever dreams of smelling apples, this indicates the approaching marriage, whether the sleeper is a man or a woman. But if the woman smells the scent of apples in the mosque, this is evidence of marriage. A woman’s piety and righteousness. But if she smells apples in front of people, this is evidence that the woman will soon become famous. We have explained to you different interpretations about seeing apples, an apple tree, or cutting and peeling apples in a dream from the interpretations of the leading scholars in dream interpretation.

title: Interpretation of seeing roses in a dream

preview.html: Roses are also generally considered a symbol of romance and beauty, so if you, dear customer, want an interpretation of seeing roses in a dream, then you should follow this article. Interpretation of a dream about roses in a dream by the interpreter Ibn Sirin. According to the interpreter Ibn Sirin: If a person sees in a dream that he is picking roses. This indicates The dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from some problems for a long time. But when he thinks correctly and wisely, he will find a solution to these problems and find comfort. Also, if one sees in a dream that he is sleeping on roses. This dream indicates that this dreamer will be happy. This also indicates The dream indicates that this dreamer will marry the girl he loves. But if one sees himself in a dream that he is picking roses or cutting rose bushes. This dream indicates that this dreamer will suffer from some problems, anxiety, and sadness for a long time. Also if the dreamer sees himself in a dream when he sees Yellow roses. This dream indicates that this dreamer will soon hear good news. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that there is a person who he did not like in reality, he will be given an answer. This dream indicates that the person who he does not like will enter into trade with the dreamer. As That the dreamer will suffer great material losses because of this person who he does not love. If the dreamer sees black roses in his dream, or as if they were presented to him in a dream. This dream indicates that this dreamer will face a very difficult time, and at this time he will face problems. This dream also indicates To the death of one of this dreamer’s relatives, and that he will also be very sad. See also: Interpretation of a dream of roses for a single womanInterpretation of roses in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqIf you see a single girl in her dream, the color of roses is red. This dream indicates that the unmarried girl will get married as soon as possible. Also, according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, if the dreamer sees red roses in his dream at the wrong time. This dream indicates sadness and delusion for the dreamer. But if a married woman sees red roses in her dream. This dream indicates that the married woman feels happy with her husband. As this shows The dream is that a married woman wants to renew the relationship between her and her husband for the better, and it also shows her love for her husband. Also, according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq, red roses in a dream for a pregnant woman. It indicates her safety and also that her child will be healthy. If a married man sees red roses in his dream This dream indicates that this married man is in a relationship with a woman other than his wife. But this relationship will be very short, and he will return to his life again. Interpretation of a dream about roses by the interpreter of Al-Nabulsi. The great interpreter of Al-Nabulsi says that if the dreamer sees roses in his dream, he distributes them. On everyone around him. This dream indicates that this dreamer will enjoy the love of everyone around him. If the dreamer sees that those around him are giving him white roses. This dream is a sign that this dreamer will get a lot of money, with which he will achieve everything he wants. Interpretation Dream of a single girl in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees roses in her dream. This dream indicates that this girl...
